downloadNoLists: There are no lists to export. Go to My lists to create a list of features.
noNotifications: You have no notification list yet.
selectLayerAndAdd: To create a list, click Create new list.
selectSearchTip: Use tools like sketch, search distance, or selection layer to select features from the input layer to add to your list.
selectLayerTip: Draw shapes to select features from the chosen selection layer; the results will be used to select features from the addressee layer
selectSketchTip: Use sketch tools to draw graphics in the map to select intersecting features in the addressee layer.
listHasSetsTip: Edit or delete existing lists or click Create new list.
exportTip: Select lists to include in file export. Choose to export lists to either a .csv or .pdf file.
title: Title
refineTip: Refine and finalize your lists by using sketch tools to add or remove features across all selection sets.
refineTipNoSelections: There are no selections to refine. Go to My lists to create a list of features.
